text: This article lists the main sport climbing (also known as competition climbing) competitions and their results for 2019. This includes the World Cup, World Championships, International Climbing Series, Continental Championships. == World Cup == {| class="wikitable" !Date !Location !Competition !Discipline !Men !Women |-
